select plt.post_tbl_id as postId, plt.user_tbl_id as userId, ut.nickname, ut.profile_image as image from post_like_tbl plt left join user_tbl ut on plt.user_tbl_id = ut.id where plt.post_tbl_id = #{postId}

select pt.*, substring(pt.created_at, 1, 10) as created_date, ( select count(*) from post_like_tbl plt where plt.post_tbl_id = pt.id ) as liked, ( select count(*) from comment_tbl ct where ct.post_tbl_id = pt.id ) as comment_count from post_tbl pt where pt.notice = 1 and pt.deleted = 0 order by pt.created_at desc limit 3

select pt.id, pt.subject, pt.thumbnail, ct.id as category_id, ct.subject as category_subject, ( select count(*) from post_like_tbl plt where plt.post_tbl_id = pt.id ) as liked from post_tbl pt join category_tbl ct on pt.category_tbl_id = ct.id where pt.created_at >= date_sub(now(), interval 7 day) and pt.deleted = 0 and pt.count >= 50 and pt.type = 0 having liked >= 3 order by liked desc, pt.count desc, pt.created_at desc limit 10

select pt.*, ut.nickname, ut.profile_image, ct.subject as category_subject, substring(pt.created_at, 1, 16) as created_view, ( select count(*) from post_like_tbl plt where plt.post_tbl_id = pt.id ) as liked from post_tbl pt join category_tbl ct on pt.category_tbl_id = ct.id join user_tbl ut on pt.user_tbl_id = ut.id where pt.id = #{postId}

set @userId = #{userId}; set @categoryId = #{categoryId};
select pt.id, pt.subject, pt.content, pt.user_tbl_id, pt.created_at , pt.count, pt.notice, pt.category_tbl_id, pt.thumbnail, pt.deleted, pt.type , (select count(*) from post_like_tbl plt where plt.post_tbl_id = pt.id) as 'liked' , (select count(*) from comment_tbl ct2 where ct2.post_tbl_id = pt.id) as 'comment_count' , substring(pt.created_at, 1, 10) as created_date , (select ut.nickname from user_tbl ut where ut.id = pt.user_tbl_id) as nickname , (select ut.profile_image from user_tbl ut where ut.id = pt.user_tbl_id) as profile_image , ct.subject as 'category_subject' , ct.type as 'categoryType' from category_tbl ct join post_tbl pt on ct.id = pt.category_tbl_id where pt.deleted = 0 and pt.type != 1 and (ct.id = @categoryId or ct.category_tbl_ref_id = @categoryId) or (ct.category_tbl_ref_id is not null and pt.type = 1 and exists( select 1 from user_role_tbl urt where urt.user_tbl_id = @userId and urt.role_tbl_id in (2, 3) ) ) order by pt.created_at desc
